posts.post_title: FS: T202 Baker Gets His Man, Baker/Collins.  SOLD
posts.post_content:
FS: T202 Baker Gets His Man, Baker/Collins.  Graded SGC 30.  This is a very nice 30, some surface wrinkles on the front and a scuff by Baker's neck.  $125 ppd.

[url=http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=684&u=11817413][img]http://i21.servimg.com/u/f21/11/81/74/13/t202ba10.jpg[/img][/url]

Thanks 

Lee
